event.title: served as the township office headquarters for Darlington Township until 1974

data.event: It originally served as the township office headquarters for Darlington Township until 1974 when it was annexed by The Town of Newcastle (now Clarington).

event.title: was annexed by The Town of Newcastle (now

data.event: It originally served as the township office headquarters for Darlington Township until 1974 when it was annexed by The Town of Newcastle (now Clarington).

event.title: was founded by Henry Elliot in 1840

data.event: Hampton was founded by Henry Elliot in 1840, who opened the first mill here in the former Darlington Township.

event.title: was called "Elliot's Mill" and then by 1848

data.event: At first it was called "Elliot's Mill" and then by 1848 just "Millsville".
